title: Filled
description: Angus plans on spending a quiet night in his hotel room until a stripper shows up at his door. Suddenly his plans have changed and even though he’s the wrong guy, she’s the right woman.Bambi would do anything to save her brother, even become a call girl. But one dance for her first client and she’s in trouble.Warning: Can a quick connection be more than just a spark? Get ready because these two are about to light up the night! Don’t worry, there’s always room for a Happily Ever After.
author: Alexa Riley
